changeSet.sql:
drop view if exists last_loans_view;
create view last_loans_view as select id, client_pin, created, status, active, total_sum, loan_product_id, paid, closed_date::date, now()::date - closed_date::date as days_ago, closed, row_number() over (PARTITION BY client_pin order by created desc) as lrk from loan_application order by client_pin, created desc;
